CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To gain a better understanding of the influence of the thermal annealing , the crystallinity and molecular organization of PCDTBT and PCDSeBT thin films were investigated by Xray diffraction ( XRD ) , both before and after annealing at 150 °C .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |

Explanation:

* PCDTBT and PCDSeBT are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
* PCDTBT stands for Poly[N-9'-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole)] and it is a type of conjugated polymer.
* PCDSeBT stands for Poly[N-9'-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole-co-4,7-di(2-thienyl)-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole)] and it is also a type of conjugated polymer.
* Both PCDTBT and PCDSeBT are thin films that were investigated for their crystallinity and molecular organization before and after thermal annealing at 150 °C.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |

Explanation:

* PCDTBT and PCDSeBT are the only material names mentioned in the paragraph.
* PCDTBT stands for Poly[N-9'-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole)] and it is a type of conjugated polymer.
* PCDSeBT stands for Poly[N-9'-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole-co-4,7-di(2-thienyl)-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole)] and it is also a type of conjugated polymer.
* The other terms in the paragraph, such as "Xray diffraction ( XRD )" and "150 °C" are not material names, but rather methods and conditions used in the investigation.

The paragraph mentions several properties related to the investigation of PCDTBT and PCDSeBT thin films. These properties include the thermal annealing process, crystallinity, molecular organization, and the annealing temperature (150 °C). The PCDTBT and PCDSeBT thin films are also mentioned as properties being investigated.

After removing entities that do not clearly refer to material properties, we are left with crystallinity and molecular organization as the valid properties mentioned in the paragraph. These properties are characteristics of the PCDTBT and PCDSeBT thin films being investigated.
